capitalContribution.valueRequired: WELSH - Enter the total value of all monetary and non-monetary contributions
capitalContribution.twoDecimalPlaces: WELSH - Value must be a number with 2 decimal places
capitalContribution.moreThanZero: WELSH - Value must be 0.01 or more
capitalContribution.noSymbols: WELSH - Value must not include currency symbols like £, $ and €
capitalContribution.noComma: WELSH - Value must not include a comma
capitalContribution.atLeastOneType: WELSH - Select at least one type of contribution
capitalContribution.currencyRequired: WELSH - Select the currency of the capital contribution

confirm.countryMissing: WELSH - We cannot identify the country for this address. Select Change, then select the country.

dateOfUpdate.registeredOfficeAddress: WELSH - Date the registered office address changed must be the same as or after limited partnership’s registration date
dateOfUpdate.principalPlaceOfBusinessAddress: WELSH - Date the principal place of business changed must be the same as or after limited partnership’s registration date’
dateOfUpdate.partnershipName: WELSH - Date the partnership name changed must be the same as or after limited partnership’s registration date
dateOfUpdate.term: WELSH - Date the term changed must be the same as or after limited partnership’s registration date
dateOfUpdate.generalPartner: WELSH - Date the general partner changed must be the same as or after limited partnership's registration date
